channel.title: Very weird limit!
channel.description:
This is really strange... Theres a limit on my server that limits players logged in. Its normally 10-13 players that can log in. I have checked player.java playerhandler.java server.java client.java. And i cannot find the problem. I have changed all max connections to like 1000 int maxplayers to like 1000 and it still dosnt let anyone when theres 10-13 players on. I am using the ZDR source. Could anyone help me please?
Thanks
Spinx
